original_text: And he made the candlestick of pure gold: of beaten work made he the candlestick; his shaft, and his branch, his bowls, his knops, and his flowers, were of the same:
korean_text: 그가 또 순금으로 등잔대를 만들되 그것을 쳐서 만들었으니 그 밑판과 줄기와 잔과 꽃받침과 꽃이 그것과 한 덩이로 되었고

sentences.original_text: And he made the candlestick of pure gold:
of beaten work made he the candlestick;
sentences.korean_translation: 두드려서 만든 작품으로 그가 촛대를 만들었고

sentences.original_text: his shaft, and his branch, his bowls,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 기둥과 그의 가지, 그의 대접들이

sentences.original_text: his knops, and his flowers, were of the same:
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 꽃받침과 그의 꽃들이 모두 같은 재질이었더라
